title: Broly46
author: Broly46
content: Would you help Newton Isaac?When Newton Isaac commit seppuku, he felt lost, not knowing the truth, and bloke, would you help and guide him to the correct direction?I would not help him, most of like-minded are very selfish, we expect you to self-learning, I also expect Newton Isaac to learn it the hard way. Btw he died and never discover the truth.
